data.eml:eml: Calappa karenae, a new species of box crab from Guam (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Calappidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Lai, Joelle C. Y. (2012): Calappa karenae, a new species of box crab from Guam (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Calappidae). Zootaxa 3393: 57-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211197
